title: Active Raid: Kidou Kyoushuushitsu Dai Hachi Gakari (Active Raid)
synopsis: In a futuristic, post-disaster Tokyo, the "Special Public Security Fifth Division Third Mobile Assault Eighth Unit," or "Unit Eight," is a police unit specializing in handling criminals who wield dangerous wearable technology called "Willwear." Equipped with Willwear of their own, the squadron is often criticized by the public for their carelessness and disregard for protocol.
related_anime: ['Active Raid: Kidou Kyoushuushitsu Dai Hachi Gakari 2nd', 'Active Raid: Kidou Kyoushuushitsu Dai Hachigakari']
